name: Space Escape (cocobean45)
description:
(make sure to play in full screen to see the full game)

Weave your way through tight obstacles in this challenging yet addicting game

  -   Hi my name is Marcus and I am a young game developer

 -    I am part of the Blue Comet game studio

  -   Beware! This game is hard and takes time to get good at

 -    Leave your suggestions and criticism in the comment section
